# Spell Resistance, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]]

**Level:** [[7th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 7]], [[Magic (Domain)|Magic 7]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 13th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 13]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Touch

**Duration:** 1 minute/level

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Archives of Maere (Wild Hunt Games), pg. 15

The creature gains spell resistance equal to 17 + your caster level.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Added Magic 7 to Level per Kingdoms of Kalamar, Lost Tomb of Kruk-Ma-Kali (Kenzer and Company).
